ai-patthana21.38:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.38:1.1_0: Not taking part of any cause or reason, a cause of desire and lust for the sake of attachment to rebirth.
ai-patthana21.38:2.1_1: said to be a group of three.
ai-patthana21.38:2.1_2: This is the cause, the reason why the three kinds of determined. ...
ai-patthana21.38:3.1_0: (This should be expanded as for the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.38:4.1_0: Not taking up the cause of desire and lust for the sake of health, the sake of seeing the cause and reason.
ai-patthana21.38:4.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.38:5.1_2: It’s for the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of their mind, and it doesn’t possible to answer.
